column2: Biden Eighty-Ninth Day: The First 100 Days
column5: Tomorrow closing arguments for the Chauvin trial begin.  Hold on tight.  Noel Chomsky M.I.T. professor of linguistics emeritus thinks Biden's approach domestically is good and better than he anticipated but his foreign policy dubious.  \According to the CDC half of all Americans has received one shot. Dr. Fauci believes the J&J vaccine will be used once the foible found and fixed.  We have told Russia there will be consequences if Navalny dies. Schumer lays the groundwork for filibuster reform.  Oh do we need this! Common Schumer and Dems. Unite!
